content: Currently, the scrolling on the web app on a mobile device is pretty clunky. As you try to scroll down, touching messages is hypersensitive and opens up the reply box. I was thinking that there could be a scroll lock somewhere on the screen, or make the hold to reply to a message much longer in order to make scrolling less frustrating.
Yep, there's an open Issue for this, and it's something I'm hopefully able to fix soon.
